014package org.gbif.api.util.validators.identifierschemes;
015
016import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
017
018import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
019import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertFalse;
020import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertTrue;
021
022/** Tests the {@link OrcidValidator}. */
023public class OrcidValidatorTest {
024
025  private static final OrcidValidator VALIDATOR = new OrcidValidator();
026
027  @Test
028  public void isValidTest() {
029    assertTrue(VALIDATOR.isValid("https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0145-6846"));
030    assertTrue(VALIDATOR.isValid("http://orcid.org/0000-0003-0145-6846"));
031    assertTrue(VALIDATOR.isValid("0000-0003-0145-6846"));
032    assertTrue(VALIDATOR.isValid("https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1093-677X"));
033    assertTrue(VALIDATOR.isValid("0000-0003-1093-677X"));
034
035    assertFalse(VALIDATOR.isValid("000d0-0003-1093-677X"));
036  }
037
038  @Test
039  public void normalizeTest() {
040    assertEquals(
041        "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0145-6846", VALIDATOR.normalize("0000-0003-0145-6846"));
042  }
043}
